name: VALUE_ADDED_TAX_CHARGED_INDICATOR_FOR_CONTRACT_MONITORING
title: Value Added Tax Charged Indicator For Contract Monitoring

contact.name: NHS Digital Data Model and Dictionary Service

description: This BETA code system represents a union of any National, Permitted and Default Codes from the NHS Data Dictionary attribute VALUE_ADDED_TAX_CHARGED_INDICATOR_FOR_CONTRACT_MONITORING, https://datadictionary.nhs.uk/attributes/value_added_tax_charged_indicator_for_contract_monitoring.html and its linked data elements as of 13th of January 2021. Note that this code system may contain active and retired concepts.

Filter to enable filtering by date of retirement

The status of the concept can be one of: draft | active | retired | unknown

concept.display: No - Value Added Tax was not included in the price of a PRESCRIBED ITEM or MEDICAL DEVICE
concept.definition: No - Value Added Tax was not included in the price of a PRESCRIBED ITEM or MEDICAL DEVICE

concept.display: Yes - Value Added Tax was included in the price of a PRESCRIBED ITEM or MEDICAL DEVICE
